title: Agricultural Economics 2
overview: Agricultural Economics 2 focuses on directly studying agricultural economics issues related to the development of Vietnamese agriculture, including the development of commodity production, agricultural specialization, intensive agriculture, agricultural service economics, economic and management issues in agricultural sub-sectors under international integration, and state management in agriculture.

key_concepts: Economic and Management Issues in Agricultural Sub-sectors

skill_outcomes.outcome_description: Students will be able to understand and apply knowledge about specialized, intensive agricultural production, and the content of various agricultural economic sectors.
Students will be able to solve specific problems in practice through information gathering and planning related to agricultural, rural, and farmer development.

Students will have a sense of self-discipline, be proactive, enthusiastic, and responsible for their work. They will also have the ability to self-study and accumulate experience to improve their professional level.
